name: Broken Rime's Echo
title: Icy Song, Distant Realm: Broken Rime's Echo
desc: "Past the ice-sealed door, walking down the corridors to the depths, he will break off a branch of silver-white, and bring hope to the snowy land."

skills.desc:
When a character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Cryo Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
